orig_text:
8.  IANA Considerations

   IANA has added 17 new assignments to the "Opus Channel Mapping
   Families^ a registry.
correct_text:
8.  IANA Considerations

   IANA has added 17 new assignments to the "Opus Channel Mapping
   Families" registry.
notes: There is a backspace character enclosed with ^ and a in place of what should be a typewriter quote character.
